Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce Python code constructing an accepting Petri net for described process using pm4py objects Include places transitions arcs loops for rework Provide initial marking token in start place final marking token in final place closed claim Also need to use pm4py utils petri utils add arc etc Provide code snippet similar to example but extended

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We should explain places start registration verification re submission fraud check in depth investigation loop assessment approval payment notification closure Provide transitions with labels

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Need to use PetriNet class from pm4py objects petri net obj import PetriNet Marking Use petri utils for adding arcs petri utils add arc from to source transition net Also remove place perhaps not needed

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: We should also delete final markings sink after removal In example they removed sink place after adding arcs to it but we can just not add sink after removal Simpler we can keep sink and not delete But we can follow example to remove a place

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to construct final marking that has token in closure place

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Better define places Verification ReSubmit Transition DV from Verification to VerificationDone Actually typical modeling after verification if documents incomplete go to re submission place after re submission go back to verification or to next step loops can be after DV before FC and after FC before CA Thus we can design Place AfterDV before FC Transition RDS from AfterDV back to AfterDV loop representing re submission a loop can be modeled by having an input place and also an output place that is the same place ie an arc from place P to transition T and an arc from T back to place P That creates a cycle Thus we can add arcs petri utils add arc from to place DV transition RDS net and petri utils add arc from to transition RDS place DV net That creates a loop Similarly for II

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Simplify Use places 1 start Init 2 reg done 3 dv done 4 fraud done 5 assessment done 6 approval done 7 payment done 8 notification done 9 closure final Transitions t CR from start to reg done label Claim Registration t DV from reg done to dv done label Document Verification t RDS loop from dv done back to dv done label Re Document Submission t FC from dv done to fraud done label Fraud Check t II loop from fraud done back to fraud done label In depth Investigation t CA from fraud done to assessment done label Claim Assessment t AP from assessment done to approval done label Approval t P from approval done to payment done label Payment t N from payment done to notification done label Notification t CL from notification done to closure label Closure

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now we need to construct Petri net add places transitions arcs using petri utils define initial marking im with token in start place Final marking fm with token in closure place Potentially also need to remove some placeholder place Not necessary The answer should include code and brief explanation Make sure to use correct imports and classes
